request.description: Post User (can be normal or admin)

item.description:
This Endpoint only Admin users have access (CRUD operations)

To create a admin user you need to create a superuser on the terminal and type the following command:

python manage.py createsuperuser

access [http://127.0.0.1:8000/admin/movie_api/user/]()  
and give a user administrator role (see register endpoint doc to create a normal user)
